description:
Create a modern news reader app with the following features:
      - Home screen with a scrollable feed of latest articles
      - Categories: Technology, Business, Sports, Entertainment
      - Article detail view with estimated reading time
      - Save articles for offline reading
      - Search articles by title and content
      - Dark mode toggle in settings
      - Pull to refresh on the feed
      - Share articles to social media

userStories.story: As a tech professional, I want to browse the latest technology articles in a dedicated category so that I can stay updated on industry trends during my commute
acceptanceCriteria: Technology category displays latest tech articles

userStories.story: As a business executive, I want to save articles for offline reading so that I can catch up on news during flights without internet
acceptanceCriteria: Save button available on each article

userStories.story: As a news enthusiast, I want to search for specific topics across all articles so that I can find relevant content quickly
acceptanceCriteria: Search works across title, content, and tags

userStories.story: As a user, I want to share interesting articles on social media so that I can discuss them with friends and colleagues
acceptanceCriteria: Share button available on article detail

userStories.story: As a user, I want to toggle dark mode so that I can read comfortably in low light conditions

technical: Must work on iOS 14+ and Android 8+
Offline storage limited to 100MB per user
Search index size constraints on mobile devices
timeline: Advanced search feature can be Phase 2
Social sharing integration priority over advanced features
platform: Native performance for scrolling and animations
Platform-specific design patterns (Material Design, iOS Guidelines)
App store compliance for both platforms

userEngagement: Daily active users (target: 70% retention after 7 days)

appDefinition.name: TechNews Daily
appDefinition.description: A modern, feature-rich news reader app providing curated technology, business, sports, and entertainment news with offline reading capabilities and social sharing functionality.

targetUsers.description: Software developers, product managers, and tech industry workers who need to stay updated on technology trends
Business leaders and entrepreneurs who follow market trends and business news
General users who consume news across multiple categories daily

appDefinition.valueProposition: The most comprehensive mobile news experience with intelligent categorization, offline reading, and seamless social sharing - designed for busy professionals who need to stay informed on-the-go.

features.name: Advanced Article Feed
features.description: Modern scrollable feed with infinite scroll, pull-to-refresh, and optimized loading

features.name: Category-Based Filtering
features.description: Filter articles by Technology, Business, Sports, and Entertainment categories

features.name: Enhanced Article Detail View
features.description: Rich article view with reading time estimation, formatted content, and media support

features.name: Offline Reading System
features.description: Save articles for offline access with local storage and sync management

features.name: Advanced Search Functionality
features.description: Search articles by title, content, author, and category with filters

features.name: Dark Mode Implementation
features.description: System-wide dark theme with user toggle and automatic detection

features.name: Social Media Sharing
features.description: Share articles to Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, WhatsApp, and native sharing

features.name: Pull-to-Refresh Mechanism
features.description: Native pull-to-refresh functionality across all article lists

features.name: Reading Time Estimation
features.description: Calculate and display estimated reading time for each article

features.name: User Settings & Preferences
features.description: Settings screen for dark mode, notifications, categories, and reading preferences

missingFeatures: All core features need to be built as template is minimal
customizationNeeds: Performance optimizations for large content lists
